column3: butter -1. Preheat a skillet on medium heat.2. Mince the onion and add it to the skillet with the butter.3. Let the onion cook for about 4 minutes until it starts to brown.4. Take the eggshells and break them into small pieces over the skillet.5. Cook the eggshells for about 5 minutes until they are cooked through.6. Serve and enjoy!
